viewModel.currentDate.collectAsState()\n var showDatePicker by remember { mutableStateOf(false) }\n\n LazyColumn(\n modifier \u003d modifier\n .fillMaxSize()\n .background(Color(0xFFF5F5F5))\n .padding(16.dp),\n verticalArrangement \u003d Arrangement.spacedBy(16.dp)\n ) {\n item {\n CaloriesTrackerCard(\n eaten \u003d uiState.totalCaloriesEaten,\n burned \u003d uiState.totalCaloriesBurned,\n remaining \u003d uiState.remainingCalories,\n goal \u003d uiState.dailyGoal\n )\n }\n\n item {\n DateSelector(\n currentDate \u003d currentDate,\n onNavigateDay \u003d viewModel::navigateDay,\n onDateClick \u003d { showDatePicker \u003d true }\n )\n }\n\n item {\n DiarySection(\n foodItems \u003d currentEntry.foodItems,\n exercises \u003d currentEntry.exercises,\n waterIntake \u003d currentEntry.waterIntake,\n onAddFood \u003d onAddFood,\n onAddExercise \u003d onAddExercise,\n onUpdateWater \u003d viewModel::updateWaterIntake,\n onRemoveFood \u003d viewModel::removeFoodItem,\n onRemoveExercise \u003d viewModel::removeExerciseItem\n )\n }\n }\n\n if (showDatePicker) {\n DatePickerDialog(\n currentDate \u003d currentDate,\n onDismiss \u003d { androidx.compose.foundation.clickable\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.layout.*\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.shape.CircleShape\nimport androidx.compose.foundation.shape.RoundedCornerShape\nimport androidx.compose.material.icons.Icons\nimport androidx.compose.material.icons.filled.*\nimport androidx.compose.material3.*\nimport androidx.compose.runtime.*\nimport androidx.compose.ui.Alignment\nimport androidx.compose.ui.Modifier\nimport androidx.compose.ui.graphics.Color\nimport androidx.compose.ui.graphics.vector.ImageVector\nimport androidx.compose.ui.text.font.FontWeight\nimport androidx.compose.ui.unit.dp\nimport androidx.compose.ui.unit.sp\nimport com.example.eatpal.data.model.ExerciseItem\nimport com.example.eatpal.data.model.FoodItem\n\n@Composable\nfun DiarySection(\n foodItems: List\u003cFoodItem\u003e,\n exercises: List\u003cExerciseItem\u003e,\n waterIntake: Int,\n onAddFood: () -\u003e Unit,\n onAddExercise: () -\u003e Unit,\n onUpdateWater: (Int) -\u003e Unit,\n onRemoveFood: (String) -\u003e Unit,\n onRemoveExercise: (String) -\u003e Unit\n) {\n var selectedTab by remember { mutableStateOf(\"EAT\") }\n\n Card(\n modifier \u003d Modifier.fillMaxWidth(),\n colors \u003d CardDefaults.cardColors(containerColor \u003d Color.White)\n ) {\n Column(modifier \u003d Modifier.padding(16.dp)) {\n // Tab Selector\n Row(\n modifier \u003d Modifier\n .fillMaxWidth()\n .padding(bottom \u003d 16.dp),\n horizontalArrangement \u003d Arrangement.Center\n ) {\n TabItem(\n text \u003d \"EAT\",\n isSelected \u003d selectedTab \u003d\u003d \"EAT\",\n onClick \u003d { selectedTab \u003d \"EAT\" }\n )\n Spacer(modifier \u003d Modifier.width(8.dp))\n TabItem(\n text \u003d \"EXERCISE\",\n isSelected \u003d selectedTab \u003d\u003d \"EXERCISE\",\n onClick \u003d { selectedTab \u003d \"EXERCISE\" }\n )\n }\n\n // Content based on selected tab\n when (selectedTab) {\n \"EAT\" -\u003e FoodContent(\n foodItems \u003d foodItems,\n waterIntake \u003d waterIntake,\n onAddFood \u003d onAddFood,\n onUpdateWater \u003d onUpdateWater,\n onRemoveFood \u003d onRemoveFood\n )\n\n \"EXERCISE\" -\u003e ExerciseContent(\n exercises \u003d exercises,\n onAddExercise \u003d onAddExercise,\n onRemoveExercise \u003d onRemoveExercise\n )\n }\n }\n }\n}\n\n@Composable\nfun TabItem(\n text: String,\n isSelected: Boolean,\n onClick: () -\u003e Unit\n) {\n Box(\n modifier \u003d Modifier\n .background(\n color \u003d if (isSelected) Color(0xFF4CAF50) else Color.Transparent,\n shape \u003d RoundedCornerShape(20.dp)\n )\n .clickable { onClick() }\n .padding(horizontal \u003d 16.dp, vertical \u003d 8.dp)\n ) {\n Text(\n text \u003d text,\n color \u003d if (isSelected) Color.White else Color.Gray,\n fontWeight \u003d if (isSelected) FontWeight.Bold else FontWeight.Normal,\n fontSize \u003d 14.sp\n )\n }\n}\n\n@Composable\nfun FoodContent(\n foodItems: List\u003cFoodItem\u003e,\n waterIntake: Int,\n onAddFood: () -\u003e Unit,\n onUpdateWater: (Int) -\u003e Unit,\n onRemoveFood: (String) -\u003e Unit\n) {\n Column {\n // Water intake\n DiaryItem(\n icon \u003d Icons.Default.Home,\n title \u003d \"Water\",\n subtitle \u003d \"$waterIntake / 64 fl oz\",\n calories \u003d null,\n onAdd \u003d { onUpdateWater(waterIntake + 8) },\n onRemove \u003d if (waterIntake \u003e 0) {\n { onUpdateWater(waterIntake - 8) }\n } else null\n )\n\n // Breakfast\n val breakfastItems \u003d foodItems.filter { it.category \u003d\u003d \"Breakfast\" }\n DiaryItem(\n icon \u003d Icons.Default.Star,\n title \u003d \"Breakfast\",\n subtitle \u003d if (breakfastItems.isNotEmpty())\n breakfastItems.joinToString(\", \") { it.name }\n else \"Add breakfast items\",\n calories \u003d breakfastItems.sumOf { it.calories }.takeIf { it \u003e 0 },\n onAdd \u003d onAddFood,\n onRemove \u003d null\n )\n\n // Show individual breakfast items\n breakfastItems.forEach { food -\u003e\n FoodItemRow(\n food \u003d food,\n onRemove \u003d { onRemoveFood(food.id) }\n )\n }\n\n // Lunch\n val lunchItems \u003d foodItems.filter { it.category \u003d\u003d \"Lunch\" }\n DiaryItem(\n icon \u003d Icons.Default.FavoriteBorder,\n title \u003d \"Lunch\",\n subtitle \u003d if (lunchItems.isNotEmpty())\n lunchItems.joinToString(\", \") { it.name }\n else \"Add lunch items\",\n calories \u003d lunchItems.sumOf { it.calories }.takeIf { it \u003e 0 },\n onAdd \u003d onAddFood,\n onRemove \u003d null\n )\n\n // Show individual lunch items\n lunchItems.forEach { food -\u003e\n FoodItemRow(\n food \u003d food,\n onRemove \u003d { onRemoveFood(food.id) }\n )\n }\n\n // Dinner\n val dinnerItems \u003d foodItems.filter { it.category \u003d\u003d \"Dinner\" }\n DiaryItem(\n icon \u003d Icons.Default.Place,\n title \u003d \"Dinner\",\n subtitle \u003d if (dinnerItems.isNotEmpty())\n dinnerItems.joinToString(\", \") { it.name }\n else \"Add dinner items\",\n calories \u003d dinnerItems.sumOf { it.calories }.takeIf { it \u003e 0 },\n onAdd \u003d onAddFood,\n onRemove \u003d null\n )\n\n // Show individual dinner items\n dinnerItems.forEach { food -\u003e\n FoodItemRow(\n food \u003d food,\n onRemove \u003d { onRemoveFood(food.id) }\n )\n }\n\n // Snack\n val snackItems \u003d foodItems.filter { it.category \u003d\u003d \"Snack\" }\n DiaryItem(\n icon \u003d Icons.Default.Favorite,\n title \u003d \"Snack\",\n subtitle \u003d if (snackItems.isNotEmpty())\n snackItems.joinToString(\", \") { it.name }\n else \"Add snack items\",\n calories \u003d snackItems.sumOf { it.calories }.takeIf { it \u003e 0 },\n onAdd \u003d onAddFood,\n onRemove \u003d null\n )\n\n // Show individual snack items\n snackItems.forEach { food -\u003e\n FoodItemRow(\n food \u003d food,\n onRemove \u003d { onRemoveFood(food.id) }\n )\n }\n\n // Add more button\n TextButton(\n onClick \u003d onAddFood,\n modifier \u003d Modifier.fillMaxWidth()\n ) {\n Icon(Icons.Default.Add, contentDescription \u003d \"Add\")\n Spacer(modifier \u003d Modifier.width(8.dp))\n Text(\"Add Food\")\n }\n }\n}\n\n@Composable\nfun ExerciseContent(\n exercises: List\u003cExerciseItem\u003e,\n onAddExercise: () -\u003e Unit,\n onRemoveExercise: (String) -\u003e Unit\n) {\n Column {\n exercises.forEach { exercise -\u003e\n DiaryItem(\n icon \u003d Icons.Default.PlayArrow,\n title \u003d exercise.name,\n subtitle \u003d \"${exercise.duration} minutes\",\n calories \u003d exercise.caloriesBurned,\n onAdd \u003d null,\n onRemove \u003d { onRemoveExercise(exercise.id) }\n )\n }\n\n if (exercises.isEmpty()) {\n Text(\n text \u003d \"No exercises recorded\",\n color \u003d Color.Gray,\n modifier \u003d Modifier.padding(vertical \u003d 16.dp)\n )\n }\n\n // Add exercise button\n TextButton(\n onClick \u003d onAddExercise,\n modifier
